introduction:
Use the child maintenance calculator to agree on a child maintenance amount if you're arranging it yourselves, or to get an idea of the amount the Child Support Agency (CSA) will work out for you.

*[CSA]: Child Support Agency
more_information:
This calculator uses the current CSA rules. It takes the following benefits into account:

- income-related benefits (eg Income Support, income-based Jobseeker’s Allowance and income-related Employment and Support Allowance)
- Pension Credit
- Contribution-based Jobseeker’s Allowance
- Contribution-based Employment and Support Allowance
- State Pension
- Incapacity Benefit
- Training Allowance
- Armed Forces Compensation Scheme payments
- War Disablement Pension
- Bereavement Allowance


^The figure is an estimate and doesn't apply to child maintenance calculated by the CSA before March 2003.^ 


*[CSA]: Child Support Agency
overview: This calculation will give you an idea of the amount you can expect to get or pay if you're arranging child maintenance yourself or through the Child Support Agency
title: Calculate child maintenance
